name: apis/telegram/bot/Message sender
description:
Sends a Telegram message.

More info: https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#sendmessage.

00efb324-8002-4834-8fdf-2204596b0dcb.type:
{
  "chat_id": (string or number),
  optional "message_thread_id": number,
  "text": string,
  optional "parse_mode": string,
  optional "entities": {
    "type": ("mention" or "hashtag" or "cashtag" or "bot_command" or "url" or "email" or "phone_number" or "bold" or "italic" or "underline" or "strikethrough" or "spoiler" or "code" or "pre" or "text_link" or "text_mention" or "custom_emoji"),
    "offset": number,
    "length": number,
    optional "url": string,
    optional "user": {
      "id": string,
      "is_bot": boolean,
      optional "first_name": string,
      optional "last_name": string,
      optional "username": string,
      optional "language_code": string,
      optional "is_premium": true,
      optional "added_to_attachment_menu": true,
      optional "can_join_groups": boolean,
      optional "can_read_all_group_messages": boolean,
      optional "supports_inline_queries": boolean
    },
    optional "language": string,
    optional "custom_emoji_id": string
  }[],
  optional "disable_web_page_preview": boolean,
  optional "disable_notification": boolean,
  optional "protect_content": boolean,
  optional "reply_to_message_id": number,
  optional "allow_sending_without_reply": boolean,
  optional "reply_markup": any
}
00efb324-8002-4834-8fdf-2204596b0dcb.name: data

48798463-9aec-43eb-87c5-f8a4ca6e7d6c.name: params
48798463-9aec-43eb-87c5-f8a4ca6e7d6c.description:
Receives static params associated with Telegram bot, including token.

More info:
https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#authorizing-your-bot

33e6e6c4-5a0c-4a34-9354-88677cb5d69b.name: ok
33e6e6c4-5a0c-4a34-9354-88677cb5d69b.description: Sends whether the request was successful.

fc70699d-7410-44f5-9034-2d5797ed7034.name: message
fc70699d-7410-44f5-9034-2d5797ed7034.description:
Sends message that was actually sent.

More info: https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#message.

8bae14df-4d9e-443b-bb5e-69e202fd34b2.name: error
8bae14df-4d9e-443b-bb5e-69e202fd34b2.description: Sends any error that might have occurred during sending the message.
